#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<stdio.h>
bool isSubsetSum(int arr[],int n,int k)
{
	  if(n==0 && k>0)
          return false;
      if(k==0)
	      return true;
      if(arr[n-1]>k)
          return isSubsetSum(arr,n-1,k);
	  return isSubsetSum(arr,n-1,k)||isSubsetSum(arr,n-1,k-arr[n-1]);		      
}

int main()
{ 
  int t,n,k,i,arr[1000];
  bool ans;
  scanf("%d",&t);
  while(t--)
  {
  	 scanf("%d %d",&n,&k);
  	 for(i=0;i<n;i++)
  	   scanf("%d",&arr[i]);
  	 ans=isSubsetSum(arr,n,k);  
     if(ans==true)
        printf("1\n");
     else
	    printf("0\n");   
  } 
  return 0;
}
